name: Just Another Day (Game Overtures)
description:
Try your hand at a day in the life of the player character.

This is a small Interactive Fiction game for the No-Brainer Interactive Fiction Jam. Three constraints were required, and the constraints I applied were:

1) Make the PC Nameable.

2) Include 3 or more endings. (There are 5, with variance)

3) Use one of these words in the narrative.

I hope you enjoy this little game, let me know your thoughts in the comments
